pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, March 28, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Halifax, Nova Scotia

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Northwood seniors’ residence to highlight Budget 2019’s progress on the implementation of national pharmacare. Minister of Rural Economic Development Bernadette Jordan will be in attendance.

Northwood Residences
2615 Northwood Terrace

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:45 a.m.

St. Stephen, New Brunswick

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with local seniors, and deliver remarks to highlight Budget 2019 investments in a better quality of life for seniors. Minister of Health Ginette Petitpas Taylor will be in attendance.

Garcelon Civic Center
22 Budd Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:30 p.m.
